about_the_game:
The purpose of the game is to keep the history of the city of Farroupilha-RS / Brazil alive and to bring to future generations the essence of the place where they live. With the passing of the years a lot changes around you and with the change sometimes, history is lost. The main objective of the game is to eternalize what the municipality has lived, lives and will live in its tourist sites, museums and architectures.

At Player City, you will be able to get to know the sights of the city of Farroupilha-RS and in the future of other cities, in addition to knowing a little about the history of the city that since 1934 has won several titles such as: "The Cradle of Italian immigration in Rio Grande do Sul, National Capital of Moscatel, National Capital of Malha, National Capital of Kiwi, Land of muscat grapes being the Heart of Serra Gaúcha. "
Take control of the character "Kiwinho" and come and visit the city of Farroupilha / RS!

Features:
  • City of Farroupilha-RS Brazil and its sights
  • Three places to visit (Salto Ventoso, Parque dos Pinheiros, Igreja da Matriz)
  • Adventure over 3 hours long
  • Museums, parks, squares, faith, venues
  • Historical knowledge of the city through videos
  • Arousing interest in getting to know the city
  • Characteristic art involving 3D semiotics and the real world.
  • Association with reality
  • Pedagogical Tool
  • Biography of the first immigrants
  • Suitable for all ages
detailed_description:
The purpose of the game is to keep the history of the city of Farroupilha-RS / Brazil alive and to bring to future generations the essence of the place where they live. With the passing of the years a lot changes around you and with the change sometimes, history is lost. The main objective of the game is to eternalize what the municipality has lived, lives and will live in its tourist sites, museums and architectures.

At Player City, you will be able to get to know the sights of the city of Farroupilha-RS and in the future of other cities, in addition to knowing a little about the history of the city that since 1934 has won several titles such as: "The Cradle of Italian immigration in Rio Grande do Sul, National Capital of Moscatel, National Capital of Malha, National Capital of Kiwi, Land of muscat grapes being the Heart of Serra Gaúcha. "
Take control of the character "Kiwinho" and come and visit the city of Farroupilha / RS!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.10
  • Processor: AMD/Intel Dual Core rodando a 2.2 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI/NVIDIA dedicada / com 512 MB de VRAM e com suporte Shader Model 4.0
  • Storage: 3500 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04
  • Processor: AMD/Intel Quad-core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI/NVIDIA dedicada / com 1GB de VRAM e com suporte Shader Model 4.0
  • Storage: 5000 MB available space

name: Player City

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10 - 64bits
  • Processor: AMD/Intel dual-core processor running at 2.2 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI/NVIDIA dedicated/integrated or mobile graphic card, with at least 512MB of dedicated VRAM and with at least Shader Model 4.0 support
  • DirectX: Version 8.0
  • Storage: 3500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 - 64bits
  • Processor: AMD / Intel Dual-Core processor running at 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI/NVIDIA dedicated or mobile graphic card with at least 1GB of dedicated VRAM and with at least Shader Model 4.0 support
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 5000 MB available space

short_description: Adventure game that integrates 3D semiotics with the real world through videos and photos of the city of Farroupilha (Rio Grande do Sul, Brazil). Take control of the character "Kiwinho" and get to know the sights.
supported_languages:
Portuguese - Brazil*, English, Japanese, Italian, Spanish - Latin America, Russian
*languages with full audio support
